backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister with user, artist, artwork, submission, and inquiry types plus maps and helpers, including conversion to public views and access control integration.
backend/migration.mo: Provides conversion logic and type mappings to migrate stored data from old artist and artwork structures to new ones with updated username fields.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and tests with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files including layout, pages, components, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router, global providers, and all application routes including artist profile creation and admin pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiriesT: Renders an admin table of purchase inquiries with loading state, empty state, and inquiry details including artwork and buyer info.
frontend/src/components/admin/ReplaceDat: Provides a destructive admin control with a confirmation dialog to replace all user and artwork data with demo data using a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/admin/Submission: Displays all artwork submissions in a table with image previews and allows admins to approve or reject submissions.
frontend/src/components/artists/CreateAr: Form for creating a new artist profile with validation, error handling, and success feedback.
frontend/src/components/artists/EditArti: Loads the caller’s artist profile and provides a form to update profile fields with validation and feedback.
frontend/src/components/artworks/EditArt: Form to edit an artwork’s details including image preview/upload, price parsing, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Guards admin routes by checking authentication and admin status, showing appropriate prompts or content.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button that handles login/logout via Internet Identity with loading states and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal form for new users to create a profile, including avatar upload, validation, and saving via backend hooks.
Context provider managing open/close state for the profile-setup modal.
frontend/src/components/gallery/ArtworkC: Displays artwork thumbnail, metadata, and price with lightbox support and navigation to artwork details.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryF: Category and sort filter controls for the gallery using select inputs.
frontend/src/components/images/ArtworkIm: Reusable image component handling loading, errors, and optional click interactions while preserving layout.
frontend/src/components/images/ArtworkLi: Fullscreen lightbox dialog for viewing artwork images with close controls.
frontend/src/components/inquiries/Purcha: Dialog for submitting a purchase inquiry, handling auth, profile checks, form submission, and success state.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Simple site footer with branding and external link attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive site header with navigation links, auth handling, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper including header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/submissions/Subm: Displays a confirmation card after artwork submission, showing submission ID, pending status, and navigation buttons.
Provides a full artwork submission form with image upload, draft saving, profile checks, and submission handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminDashboard.ts: Provides queries and mutations for admins to manage submissions and purchase inquiries, including approve/reject actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtists.ts: Exposes hooks for fetching artist lists, specific artist data, and creating/updating caller artist profiles with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtworks.ts: Fetches all artworks or a specific artwork by ID using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Manages user profile retrieval and saving, and checks if the caller has admin privileges.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteArtwork.ts: Provides a mutation for deleting artworks and invalidates related artwork and submission caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useEditArtwork.ts: Exposes a mutation to edit artwork details and refreshes related cache entries after updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, managing login, identity persistence, and status tracking for authenticated users.
frontend/src/hooks/useMySubmissions.ts: Fetches the current user's artwork submissions using react-query and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/usePurchaseInquiry.ts: Creates purchase inquiries via mutation and invalidates the inquiries query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useReplaceDataset.ts: Triggers dataset replacement and invalidates all relevant data queries afterward.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitArtwork.ts: Submits new artwork through an actor call and refreshes artwork and submission queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles plus custom color variables and component utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin UI showing submissions, inquiries, and a dataset reset control in tabbed layout.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistProfilePage.tsx: Displays an artist profile with their artworks and edit controls for the profile owner.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistsPage.tsx: Lists all artists with bios, website links, and navigation to individual profiles.
frontend/src/pages/ArtworkDetailsPage.ts: Shows detailed artwork info, owner controls, purchase inquiry flow, and deletion dialog.
frontend/src/pages/CreateArtistProfilePa: Provides a form for authenticated users to create a new artist profile.
frontend/src/pages/EditArtistProfilePage: Allows authenticated artists to edit their profile or prompts creation if none exists.
frontend/src/pages/EditArtworkPage.tsx: Page for editing an artwork, handling auth, ownership checks, loading states, and rendering an edit form.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays all artworks with category filtering, sorting, and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero, features, and calls to action for exploring the gallery or submitting art.
frontend/src/pages/MyProfilePage.tsx: User profile editor handling authentication, avatar uploads, form validation, and profile saving.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitArtworkPage.tsx: Artwork submission flow with auth/profile checks, draft clearing, and a submission form.
frontend/src/utils/fileToDataUrl.ts: Converts an image File to a data URL with type and size validation.
frontend/src/utils/gbpMoney.ts: Utility functions for formatting, parsing, and converting GBP money values.
frontend/src/utils/imageFailureReason.ts: Provides user-friendly messages for image load failures and pre-validates image URLs.
frontend/src/utils/optionalEmail.ts: Helpers for normalizing optional email fields for backend storage and UI display.
frontend/src/utils/submitArtworkDraft.ts: Manages loading, saving, and clearing artwork submission drafts in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and remove them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending themes, colors, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, features, and new requests related to supporting private profile names and unique public site usernames.
